preface.title: About This Guide
preface.para: &productname; &productnumber; is an extension to &cephos;. It combines the capabilities of the &ceph; () storage project with the enterprise engineering and support of &suse;. &productname; &productnumber; provides IT organizations with the ability to deploy a distributed storage architecture that can support a number of use cases using commodity hardware platforms.

Many chapters in this manual contain links to additional documentation resources. These include additional documentation that is available on the system as well as documentation available on the Internet.
